slogan.title: Connecting chances
slogan.content: We work closely with you to help you realize your initiatives/programs/projects that bring sustainable benefits to our community in short, medium and long terms.

aboutUs.title: CC Foundation
aboutUs.description: CC Foundation was founded on May 4th 2021 with the primary mission of funding sustainable community development initiatives/programs/projects by individuals and organizations in strict accordance with current rules and regulations.

persons.position1: Master in IT & BA - IT Senior Advisor
persons.position2: Master in Banking & Finance - Community Project Appraisal Senior Advisor
